title: The planning, design and installation of electrical installations, air-conditioning and heating work shall be carried out in accordance with Part-8 - Building Services, Section-2 - Electrical and allied Installations, Section-3 - Air Conditioning, heating and mechanical ventilation of National building Code of India, amended from time to time
clause_text: The planning, design and installation of electrical installations, air-conditioning and heating work shall be carried out in accordance with Part-8 - Building Services, Section-2 - Electrical and allied Installations, Section-3 - Air Conditioning, heating and mechanical ventilation of National building Code of India, amended from time to time.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
